directions: Whisk vinegar, shallot, and honey in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Combine romaine and next 6 ingredients in very large bowl; toss to blend. Add dressing and toss to coat.
Divide salad among plates. Sprinkle with blue cheese, if desired, and serve.
ingredients: 1/4 cup hazelnut oil or extra-virgin olive oil
1 large Fuji apple, halved, cored, diced
1 mango, peeled, diced, or 2 Fuyu persimmons, peeled, seeded, diced
3/4 cup hazelnuts, toasted, husked, coarsely chopped
title: Rainbow Chopped Salad
